body_html:
As for using tfd.Mixture, it appears to not be broadcasting the mixture distribution. That said it can be made to work by tiling the mix probs, eg

mix = 0.3
bimix_gauss = tfd.Mixture(
    cat=tfd.Categorical(probs=[[mix, 1.-mix],[mix,1.-mix]]),
    components=[
        tfd.Normal(loc=[-1.,0], scale=[0.1,0.2]),
        tfd.Normal(loc=[+1.,2.], scale=[0.5,3]),
])

body:
As for using tfd.Mixture, it appears to not be broadcasting the mixture distribution. That said it can be made to work by tiling the mix probs, eg


    mix = 0.3
    bimix_gauss = tfd.Mixture(
        cat=tfd.Categorical(probs=[[mix, 1.-mix],[mix,1.-mix]]),
        components=[
            tfd.Normal(loc=[-1.,0], scale=[0.1,0.2]),
            tfd.Normal(loc=[+1.,2.], scale=[0.5,3]),
    ])
